0,"So flattering and so comfortable! I am in love with this dress! It has a relaxed fit style as described, and I received compliments from my sister and a stranger when I was doing groceries haha. It has pockets and a zipper on the left side. The fabric is breathable and comfortable. It fits perfectly and has the perfect length. I paired it with beige sandals and a beige crossbody bag for a casual look. For reference I am 5'1 and got a size extra small. You can also click my name to see my profile for more items I love!", So flattering and so comfortable! I am in love with this dress! It has a relaxed fit style as described . 10,It shrinks Overall for the price itâs a cute sweater. Itâs stretchy enough to where you can pull it back to normal but itâs going to be an often occurrence. Itâs very soft and actually very comfy to wear.HOWEVER. This thing shrinks like heck in the dryer and it shows in the sleeves (which come up a couple inches). It also shrinks the neckline that will then hug your neck. One size fits all is a mild laugh, if you are any sort of busty then prepare to show that off. Very much wish there were sizes so I could go up one.Other than that not a horrible purchase for the colder months and something cute to wear thatâs not Xmas related.", One size fits all is a mild laugh .
